speaker.whotheyare: Helen Tupper is the co-founder of Amazing If, an award-winning company with a mission to make careers better for everyone.
speaker.whylisten:
Helen Tupper is co-author of bestselling book The Squiggly Career and co-host of the popular UK careers podcast "Squiggly Careers". Prior to Amazing If, she was Commercial Marketing Director at Microsoft UK and also held leadership roles at Virgin, BP and E.On. Tupper is an alumnus of Henley (MBA), Cranfield and Nottingham Business School and a qualified coach.

Outside of work, she is mum to Henry and Madeleine and a Trustee of Working Families Charity.
